[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@mahadao/arth-base](./arth-base.md) &gt; [PopulatableLiquity](./arth-base.populatableliquity.md) &gt; [redeemARTH](./arth-base.populatableliquity.redeemarth.md)

## PopulatableLiquity.redeemARTH() method

Redeem ARTH to native currency (e.g. Ether) at face value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
redeemARTH(amount: Decimalish, maxRedemptionRate?: Decimalish): Promise<PopulatedRedemption<P, S, R>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./arth-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of ARTH to be redeemed. |
|  maxRedemptionRate | [Decimalish](./arth-base.decimalish.md) | Maximum acceptable [redemption rate](./arth-base.fees.redemptionrate.md)<!-- -->. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[PopulatedRedemption](./arth-base.populatedredemption.md)<!-- -->&lt;P, S, R&gt;&gt;

## Remarks

If `maxRedemptionRate` is omitted, the current redemption rate (based on `amount`<!-- -->) plus 0.1% is used as maximum acceptable rate.
